TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlDataDocument extends System.Xml.XmlDocument

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("XmlDataDocument class will be removed in a future release.")]
[<System.Obsolete("XmlDataDocument class will be removed in a future release.")>]

summary.span: 允许通过相关的 存储、检索和操作结构化数据。

span.span: Allows structured data to be stored, retrieved, and manipulated through a relational .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类扩展 。This class extends . 它使您可以加载关系数据或 XML 数据，并使用万维网联合会 (W3C) 文档对象模型 (DOM) 来处理数据。It enables you to load either relational data or XML data and manipulate that data using the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Document Object Model (DOM). DOM 将数据显示为节点对象的层次结构。The DOM presents data as a hierarchy of node objects. 由于 `XmlDataDocument` 实现了 接口，因此它还可用作类的源文档 。Because `XmlDataDocument` implements the interface, it can also be used as the source document for the class. `XmlDataDocument` 具有与类的紧密隶属关系 `DataSet` ，该类提供加载的 XML 数据的关系视图。`XmlDataDocument` has a close affiliation with the `DataSet` class, which provides a relational view of the loaded XML data. 对所做的任何更改 `XmlDataDocument` 都会反映在中 `DataSet` ，反之亦然。Any changes made to the `XmlDataDocument` are reflected in the `DataSet` and vice versa. 若要加载 `DataSet` 具有 XML 数据的，请使用 生成关系映射。To load a `DataSet` with XML data, use to build a relational mapping. 然后，可以使用或加载 XML 数据 。The XML data can then be loaded using or . 若要加载关系数据，请 `DataSet` 在构造函数中指定包含关系数据的作为参数 。To load relational data, specify the `DataSet` containing the relational data as the parameter in the constructor.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Data.DataSet dataset) cil managed

span.span: The to load into .

summary.span: 使用指定的 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `XmlDataDocument`与指定的同步 `DataSet` 。The `XmlDataDocument` is synchronized with the specified `DataSet`. 中的任何数据 `DataSet` 都可以通过立即获得 `XmlDataDocument` 。Any data in the `DataSet` is immediately available through the `XmlDataDocument`. 中的任何更改 `DataSet` 都会传播到 `XmlDataDocument` 。Any changes in the `DataSet` are propagated in the `XmlDataDocument`. 在中所做的任何更改 `XmlDataDocument` （如果与 `DataSet` 架构匹配）都将传播到 `DataSet` 。Any changes made in the `XmlDataDocument`, provided they match the `DataSet` schema, are propagated in the `DataSet`. ## Examples 下面的示例将 customer 表加载到中 `XmlDataDocument` 。The following example loads a customer table into an `XmlDataDocument`. 该示例使用 SQL Server 2000 Northwind 数据库。The example uses the SQL Server 2000 Northwind database. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.XmlDataDocument1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.XmlDataDocument1 Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.XmlDataDocument1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.XmlDataDocument1 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.XmlDataDocument1 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.XmlDataDocument1 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

Public Overrides Function CloneNode (deep As Boolean) As XmlNode

param.name: deep
param.span: 若要递归地克隆指定节点下的子树，则为 ；若仅克隆节点本身，则为 。

span.span: to recursively clone the subtree under the specified node; to clone only the node itself.

summary.span: 创建当前节点的副本。

span.span: Creates a duplicate of the current node.
The cloned node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 克隆 `XmlDataDocument` 还会克隆 架构。Cloning the `XmlDataDocument` also clones the schema. 如果 `deep` 设置为 `false` ，则克隆的 `DataSet` 不包含任何数据，即没有行。If `deep` is set to `false`, the cloned `DataSet` has no data; that is, no rows. 如果 `deep` 设置为 `true` ，则将克隆的 `DataSet` 设置为架构，然后用数据进行填充。If `deep` is set to `true`, the cloned `DataSet` is set with the schema and then populated with the data. 请参阅 类中的 `XmlNode` ，查看描述此方法如何与每个不同的节点类型一起工作的表。See in the `XmlNode` class to see a table describing how this method behaves with each of the different node types. ## Examples 下面的示例将加载 `DataSet` 到中 `XmlDataDocument` ，然后创建的浅表克隆 `XmlDataDocument` 。The following example loads a `DataSet` into an `XmlDataDocument` and then creates a shallow clone of the `XmlDataDocument`. 该示例使用 SQL Server 2000 Northwind 数据库。The example uses the SQL Server 2000 Northwind database. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.CloneNode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.CloneNode Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.CloneNode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.CloneNode Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.CloneNode Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.CloneNode Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `XPathNavigator`提供对数据的只读随机访问。The `XPathNavigator` provides read-only, random access to data. 由于它已针对 XSLT 转换进行了优化，因此它可在用作方法的输入机制时提供性能优势 。Because it is optimized for XSLT transformations, it provides performance benefits when used as an input mechanism to the method. ## Examples 若要使用和查看 XSLT 转换 `XmlDataDocument` `XPathNavigator` ，请参见 方法。To see an XSLT transformation using `XmlDataDocument` and an `XPathNavigator`, see the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 利用， `DataSet` 您可以 `XmlDataDocument` 使用关系模型访问中的数据。The `DataSet` enables you to access the data in the `XmlDataDocument` using a relational model. 这意味着您可以将数据作为表和视图、行和列、关系等进行处理。This means that you can handle the data as tables and views, rows and columns, relations, and so on. 在中所做的更改在中 `DataSet` 立即可见 `XmlDataDocument` 。Changes made in the `DataSet` are immediately visible in the `XmlDataDocument`. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法修改书籍的价格 `DataSet` 。The following example modifies the price of a book using the `DataSet` methods. [!code-cpp[XmlDataDocument.GetRowFromElement#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlDataDocument.GetRowFromElement/CPP/getrow.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlDataDocument.GetRowFromElement#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlDataDocument.GetRowFromElement/CS/getrow.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlDataDocument.GetRowFromElement#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlDataDocument.GetRowFromElement/VB/getrow.vb#1)] 该示例使用以下输入文件：The example uses the following input files: `2books.xml` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.DataSet Example#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.DataSet Example/XML/source.xml#2)] `store.xsd` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.DataSet Example#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlDataDocument.DataSet Example/XML/source.xml#3)]

summary.span: 使用指定的数据源加载 ，然后用加载的数据同步 。

span.span: Loads the using the specified data source and synchronizes the with the loaded data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 为了查看 XML 数据 relationally，必须先指定用于数据映射的架构。In order to view the XML data relationally, you must first specify a schema to use for data mapping. 这可以通过调用 方法或通过手动创建表和列来实现 `DataSet` 。This can be done either by calling the method or by creating the tables and columns within the `DataSet` manually. 必须在调用之前完成此步骤 `Load` 。This step must be done before calling `Load`. `XmlDataDocument` 不支持创建实体引用。`XmlDataDocument` does not support creating entity references. 如果数据包含实体引用，则该 `Load` 方法解析并展开任何实体引用。If the data includes entity references, the `Load` method resolves and expands any entity references. 但是，如果使用 `Load` 采用 作为参数的重载，则必须指定 `XmlReader` 可解析实体的。However, if you are using the `Load` overload that takes a as an argument, you must specify an `XmlReader` that can resolve entities.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `XmlDataDocument` 不支持创建实体引用。`XmlDataDocument` does not support creating entity references. 如果数据包含实体引用，则该 `Load` 方法解析并展开任何实体引用。If the data includes entity references, the `Load` method resolves and expands any entity references. > [!NOTE] > 为了查看 XML 数据 relationally，必须先指定用于数据映射的架构。In order to view the XML data relationally, you must first specify a schema to use for data mapping. 这可以通过调用 方法或通过手动创建表和列来实现 `DataSet` 。This can be done either by calling the method or by creating the tables and columns within the `DataSet` manually. 必须在调用之前完成此步骤 `Load` 。This step must be done before calling `Load`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Load(class System.Xml.XmlReader reader) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Load (reader As XmlReader)

param.name: reader
param.span: 包含要加载的 XML 文档的 。

span.span: The containing the XML document to load.

summary.span: 从指定的 加载 。

span.span: Loads the from the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `XmlDataDocument` 不支持创建实体引用。`XmlDataDocument` does not support creating entity references. 如果数据源包含实体引用，则必须创建， 并将 属性设置为 EntityHandling. entityhandling.expandentities (这是默认行为) 并将传递 `XmlValidatingReader` 给 `Load` 方法。If the data source contains entity references, you must create an with the property set to EntityHandling.ExpandEntities (this is the default behavior) and pass the `XmlValidatingReader` to the `Load` method. 如果不使用 `XmlValidatingReader` ，则该方法将 `Load` 引发异常。If you do not use an `XmlValidatingReader`, the `Load` method throws an exception. `Load`方法始终保留有效的空白区域。The `Load` method always preserves significant white space. 属性确定是否保留空白。The property determines whether or not white space is preserved. 默认值为 `false` ，则不保留空格。The default is `false`, white space is not preserved. 如果读取器处于初始状态 (即 ReadState =ReadState.Initial) ，则将 `Load` 使用读取器的全部内容，并根据所找到的内容生成 DOM。If the reader is in the initial state (that is, ReadState=ReadState.Initial), `Load` consumes the entire contents of the reader and builds the DOM from what it finds. 如果读取器已位于深度为 "n" 的某个节点上，则此方法会将该节点及其所有后续同级加载到结束标记（关闭深度 "n"）。If the reader is already positioned on some node at depth "n", then this method loads that node and all subsequent siblings up to the end tag that closes depth "n". 这会产生以下结果。This has the following results. 如果当前节点及其同级节点如下所示：If the current node and its following siblings look similar to the following: ```xml onetwo ``` `Load` 引发异常，因为文档不能有两个根级别的元素。`Load` throws an exception, because a document cannot have two root-level elements. 如果当前节点及其同级节点如下所示：If the current node and its following siblings look similar to the following: ```xml ``` `Load` 将成功;但是，由于没有根级别元素，因此你将拥有一个不完整的 DOM 树。`Load` will succeed; however, you will have an incomplete DOM tree, because there is no root-level element. 在保存文档之前，必须添加根级别元素;否则，该 方法将引发异常。You have to add a root-level element before you save the document; otherwise, the method throws an exception. 如果读取器定位于对于文档的根级别来说无效的叶节点（如空白或属性节点），则读取器继续读取，直到定位在可用于根的节点上。If the reader is positioned on a leaf node that is invalid for the root level of a document (for example, a white space or attribute node), the reader continues to read until it is positioned on a node that can be used for the root. 文档在此时开始加载。The document begins loading at this point. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法修改书籍的价格 `DataSet` 。The following example modifies the price of a book using the `DataSet` methods. [!code-cpp[XmlDataDocument.Load#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlDataDocument.Load/CPP/loadrdr.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlDataDocument.Load#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlDataDocument.Load/CS/loadrdr.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlDataDocument.Load#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlDataDocument.Load/VB/loadrdr.vb#1)] 该示例使用以下两个输入文件。The example uses the following two input files. `2books.xml` [!code-xml[XmlDataDocument.Load#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlDataDocument.Load/XML/2books.xml#2)] `store.xsd` [!code-xml[XmlDataDocument.Load#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlDataDocument.Load/XML/test.xsd#3)]

exception.span: 正在加载的 XML 包含实体引用，而该读取器不能解析实体。

span.span: The XML being loaded contains entity references, and the reader cannot resolve entities.
